contexts.context: ...letter dated 6 July 1970. When the historian <mark>Friedrich</mark> Heer and Auden, both entranced, struck sparks...
...muttering to itself unheeded until the familiar voice of <mark>Friedrich</mark> Hee came through, reading one of his book reviews...
...manisch-depressive Genie, dieser innerlich verschreckte Lausbub <mark>Friedrich</mark> Heer, und der grosse englische Dichter Auden,...
